#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>

#define scan(n)  scanf("%d",&n)
#define print(n) printf("%d\n",n)

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,pos,n,max,count,num;
   scan(t);

   while(t--)
   {

     scan(n);

     count=1;
     pos=1;

     scan(num);
     n--;

     max=num;
     count++;

     while(n--)
     {

       scan(num);

       if(num>max)
       {

         max=num;
         pos=count;

       }

       count++;

     }

     print(pos);

   }

   return 0;

}
